name: UComboGraphNodeAnimBase
doc:
Base Class for all Anim related Combo Graph nodes (montage or sequence)

Holds runtime properties for animation and effects / cues containers.

RootMotionScale: Sets scale to apply to root motion translation on the animating character
bStopAnimationWhenAbilityEnds:
If true, this montage will be aborted if the ability ends normally. It is always stopped when the ability is explicitly cancelled.

This value is passed down to the ability task playing the montage, and corresponds to bStopWhenAbilityEnds parameter value of the PlayMontageAndWait ability task.
DamageHandlingMethod:
Specify which method to use to handle Effects Containers

When using Gameplay Abilities, you should use `AbilitySystem` method and go through Gameplay Effects to modify your Attributes.

Non Gameplay Abilities user can fallback to Unreal's Damage System.
EffectsContainerMap: Map of gameplay tags we're listening to gameplay effect containers
DamagesContainerMap: Map of gameplay tags we're listening to damage containers
CostGameplayEffect: This GameplayEffect represents the cost (mana, stamina, etc) of the combo node. It will be applied when the node is committed.
EventTags:
This tag container can be used to define Gameplay Tags to listen to with the underlying "Play Montage and Wait For Event" task.

While the animation is playing, if a gameplay event with one of those tags is sent to the owning actor, the "EventReceived" delegate
for the "StartComboGraph" task will be called with the Gameplay Tag for the event and Gameplay Event Data structure.
CuesContainerMap: Map of gameplay tags we're listening to to gameplay cues containers
NotifyStatesOverrides:
Notify states overrides for Auto Setup.

Before going through play montage task, adds all items from this map to plugin settings map (if any keys are in both, the value from the node map wins).

If animation asset (montage or sequence) being played is using one of the AnimNotifyState, the auto setup for this notify is ignored (notifies in anim assets win).

methods.name: GetAvatarActor
methods.doc: Returns the direct parent node that this node was transitioned from.

methods.name: GetAvatarAsCharacter
methods.doc: Returns the direct parent node that this node was transitioned from.

methods.name: GetAvatarAsPawn
methods.doc: Returns the direct parent node that this node was transitioned from.

methods.name: GetMagnitudeForContainer
GetOwnerActor
methods.doc: Returns the direct parent node that this node was transitioned from.

methods.name: CanActivateNode
methods.doc: Returns true if this node can be activated right now. Has no side effects.

methods.name: GetAnimationAsset
methods.doc: Returns the animation asset defined in editor for the node. Can be either a sequence or montage.

methods.name: GetAnimationClass
methods.doc:
Returns the type as text of underlying animation asset for the node. Can be either a sequence or montage.

Effectively just calling AnimationAsset->GetClass();

methods.name: GetChildren
methods.doc: Returns the list of children nodes for this node, that is direct descendant in the graph hierarchy.

methods.name: GetNodeTitle
methods.doc: Returns title for the node as displayed in the editor (either name of the animation asset or if defined the NodeTitle property)

methods.name: GetOwningAbility
methods.doc: Returns the owning gameplay ability this node currently being played in. Should only return valid instance if the ability is currently active / running.

methods.name: GetOwningGraph
methods.doc: Returns the ComboGraph UObject this node is part of.

methods.name: GetOwningTask
methods.doc: Returns the owning ability task this node currently being played in. Should only return valid instance if the task is currently active / running.

methods.name: GetPreviousNode
methods.doc: Returns the direct parent node that this node was transitioned from.

methods.name: OnActivated
methods.doc:
Event triggered when the node is activated and transitioned to in the owning graph.

This only triggers if checks (CanActivateNode / Cost commit) have been successful and not preventing execution.

methods.name: OnDeactivated
methods.doc: Event triggered when the node is ending and owning graph is transitioning to the next node (or ending the graph).

methods.name: OnEventReceived
methods.doc:
Event triggered when the actor owning the combo graph this node is part of is receiving a gameplay event this node listens to
(either with the EventTags property or if it is defining Gameplay Effects or Cues Containers).

methods.name: OnInitialized
methods.doc: Event triggered when the node is activated and transitioned to in the owning graph, before CanActivateNode checks / cost commit and activation.

methods.name: OnMontagePlay
methods.doc: Event triggered when the animation asset for this node is played as an anim montage in the owning ability task and gameplay ability.
